# Clipboard store

## Clipboard values

| Property  | default | Description     |
| :-------- | :------ | :-------------- |
| clipboard | ""      | Clipboard value |

## Clipboard events

| Event name | Argument | Description                          |
| :--------- | :------- | :----------------------------------- |
| onChange   | string   | Called when the clipboard is changed |
| onMount    | Element  | Called when the component is mounted |
| onClean    | null     | Called when the component is removed |

## Clipboard state

```ts
export interface ClipboardState {
        snapshot: [ClipboardState]
        clipboard: string
        callback(): void
        onChange(): void
        onMount(): void
        onClean(): void
}
```
